title: How to Play Chubby Bunnies

steps.headline: Put as many marshmallows as it takes to fill up your mouth.
Try to say "Chubby Bunnies" without spitting out any marshmallows.
Attempt to put more marshmallows into your mouth
Repeat these steps until you absolutely can't fit another marshmallow into your mouth.

text: Put as many marshmallows as it takes to fill up your mouth.  Try to say "Chubby Bunnies" without spitting out any marshmallows.  Attempt to put more marshmallows into your mouth  Say chubby bunnies again  Repeat these steps until you absolutely can't fit another marshmallow into your mouth.
